definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
